cab.content: During the past week the higher administrative staff cf the Board have been principally occupied in revision of the draft Education Bill, to which I referred in my last Report.A Minute modifying Article 46 of the Code of Regulations for public Elementary Schools' has been presented to parliament.With a view to making myself acquainted with opinions repre-sentative of the various aspects of Education in this Country I have made a point of receiving a number of Deputations from some of the leading Educational societies and Organisations which were desirous of laying their proposals before me.27th April, 1917.
